title: Rogla’s Revenge: Primož Roglič Kicks Past Juan Ayuso in Catalunya Mountaintop Duel
content:
Roglič moves into GC lead on Monsterrat summit finish after being denied by Ayuso on Wednesday in a mouthwatering preview of their Giro d'Italia clash.

Read the full article at Rogla’s Revenge: Primož Roglič Kicks Past Juan Ayuso in Catalunya Mountaintop Duel on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
